entry.title: Welcome to Yongsu‚Äôs Blog
entry.content:
This is my first post

Here I‚Äôd like to test the image upload and typora.

I‚Äôm getting used to use typora, markdown, and github action for my github page blog. üòÅ

I am working as a Machine Learning Engineer, so the contents will be related to it. But everything I want to write and share can be posted.

I really appreciate to all people who made the tools, like github, typora, vscode, etc., which I am using to distribute my personal blog totally free.

All details about me will be added while uploading posts.
